title: Snow comes to Shandan Military Horse Farm
text:
Scenery covered with snow at the Shandan Military Horse Farm in Zhangye, Northwest China's Gansu province. [Photo by Wang Chao for chinadaily.com.cn]

On October 12, 2019, cold winds brought snow to the Shandan Military Horse Farm in Northwest China's Gansu province. After the blizzard, the snow-wrapped scenery that remained gave people a new visual experience.

The farm in is located in Zhangye city, in the middle of the province's Hexi Corridor. The farm has a history of more than 2,130 years.
